articles.title: Apple Inc. Reports Strong Q4 Earnings, Beats Estimates
articles.excerpt: Apple Inc. announced quarterly revenue of $77B, exceeding analyst expectations by 3%.

articles.title: Apple Inc. Expands iPhone Operations
articles.excerpt: The company announced expansion plans in key markets, strengthening its position in the iPhone industry.
